pullrequest.title: added base_footprint, tighter amcl config, and better rviz config

content.raw:
Nice! Do you have an example of trajectory that you know works (like a set of goals / rooms the robot successfully navigate to)?
I tried a few times and can navigate well in open space but couldnt get the robot to enter any room so far. It just keeps rotating in front of the door and with the AMCL drift the costmap end up totally cluttered
